      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205392</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Legacies: Shri Krupa Dance Foundation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Legacy: Shri Krupa Tanz-Grundlage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Legs : Base de Danse de Shri Krupa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Legacies: Fundação Da Dança De Shri 
Krupa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eredità: Fondamento Di Ballo Di Shri Krupa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κληρονομιές: Ίδρυμα χορού Krupa Shri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Herencias: Fundación De la Danza De Shri 
Krupa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Dancer, teacher and choreographer Vishal Ramani discusses her 30 years in the Bay Area developing the Shri Krupa Dance Foundation, a non-profit center that offers daily classes on the complex tradition of Bharata Natyam. This Educator Guide is about the Indian dance form of Bharata Natyam and its traditions and practices.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tänzer, Lehrer und Choreograph Vishal Ramani 
behandelt sie 30 Jahre im Bucht-Bereich, der die Shri Krupa 
Tanz-Grundlage, eine gemeinnützige Mitte entwickelt, die tägliche 
Kategorien auf der komplizierten Tradition von Bharata Natyam 
anbietet. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über das indische 
Tanzformular von Bharata Natyam und seine Traditionen und Praxis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le danseur, le professeur et le chorégraphe 
Vishal Ramani la discute 30 ans dans la région de compartiment 
développant la base de danse de Shri Krupa, un centre sans but 
lucratif qui offre les classes quotidiennes sur la tradition complexe 
de Bharata Natyam. Ce guide d'éducateur est au sujet de la 
forme indienne de danse de Bharata Natyam et ses traditions et 
pratiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O dancer, o professor e o choreographer Vishal 
Ramani discutem-na 30 anos na área da baía que desenvolve a 
fundação da dança de Shri Krupa, um centro non-profit que ofereça 
classes diárias na tradição complexa de Bharata Natyam. Esta 
guia do educador é sobre o formulário indian da dança de Bharata 
Natyam e suas tradições e práticas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il ballerino, l'insegnante ed il choreographer 
Vishal Ramani la discute 30 anni nella zona della baia che sviluppa il
fondamento di ballo di Shri Krupa, un centro senza scopo di lucro che 
offre i codici categoria quotidiani sulla tradizione complessa di 
Bharata Natyam. Questa guida dell'educatore è circa la forma 
indiana di ballo di Bharata Natyam e le relative tradizioni e 
pratiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο χορευτής, ο δάσκαλος και το χορογράφος Vishal 
Ramani συζητούν 30 έτη της στην περιοχή κόλπων που 
αναπτύσσει το ίδρυμα χορού Shri Krupa, ένα μη κερδοσκοπικό 
κέντρο που προσφέρει τις καθημερινές κλάσεις στη σύνθετη 
παράδοση Bharata Natyam. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών 
είναι για την ινδική μορφή χορού Bharata Natyam και των 
παραδόσεων και των πρακτικών του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El bailarín, el profesor y el coreógrafo Vishal 
Ramani la discute 30 años en el área de la bahía que desarrolla la 
fundación de la danza de Shri Krupa, un centro no lucrativo que 
ofrezca clases diarias en la tradición compleja de Bharata Natyam. 
Esta guía del educador está sobre la forma india de la danza 
de Bharata Natyam y sus tradiciones y prácticas.</string>
          </description>
